languages.text: {n}Вы внимательно осматриваете сервитора, пока, наконец, не находите люк в его груди. Открутив болты и сняв пластину, вы находите провода, отвечающие за замкнувшую части {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментики{/g}, и перерезаете их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы внимательно осматриваете сервитора, пока, наконец, не находите люк в его груди. Открутив болты и сняв пластину, вы находите провода, отвечающие за замкнувшую части аугментики, и перерезаете их.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы внимательно осматриваете сервитора, пока, наконец, не находите люк в его груди. Открутив болты и сняв пластину, вы находите провода, отвечающие за замкнувшую части {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментики{/g}, и перерезаете их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You carefully examine the Servitor until you eventually spot the cover in its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed augmetic parts and cut them.{/n}

{n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你小心翼翼地检查着面前的机仆，最终发现问题出现在它胸前的盖子中。你拧开盖子，取下盖板，发现了出故障的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的电线，把它们拆了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你小心翼翼地检查着面前的奴工，最终发现问题出现在它胸前的盖子中。你拧开盖子，取下盖板，发现了出故障的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的电线，把它们拆了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Inspeccionas cuidadosamente al servidor hasta encontrar la tapa de su pecho. Tras destornillar y retirar la placa, encuentras los cables de las piezas del {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} fallido y las cortas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Inspeccionas cuidadosamente al servidor hasta encontrar la tapa de su pecho. Tras destornillar y retirar la placa, encuentras los cables de las piezas del {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} fallido y las cortas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターをじっくり調べ上げ、ついに胸にあるカバーを見つけた。ネジを緩めてプレートを取り外し、壊れた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}のパーツの配線を見つけて切断する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターをじっくり調べ上げ、ついに胸にあるカバーを見つけた。ネジを緩めてプレートを取り外し、壊れた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}のパーツの配線を見つけて切断する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du untersuchst den Servitor sorgfältig, bis du schließlich die Abdeckklappe auf seiner Brust entdeckst. Nachdem du die Platte abgeschraubt und entfernt hast, findest du die Kabel der defekten {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetischen{/g} Teile und schneidest sie durch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du untersuchst den Servitor sorgfältig, bis du schließlich die Abdeckklappe auf seiner Brust entdeckst. Nachdem du die Platte abgeschraubt und entfernt hast, findest du die Kabel der defekten {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetischen{/g} Teile und schneidest sie durch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un examen attentif du servitor vous permet de découvrir un capot sur sa poitrine. Une fois la plaque dévissée et retirée, vous parvenez à couper les fils de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} défectueux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un examen attentif du servitor vous permet de découvrir un capot sur sa poitrine. Une fois la plaque dévissée et retirée, vous parvenez à couper les fils de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} défectueux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörü dikkatlice inceleyip nihayet göğsündeki kapağı fark ediyorsun. Plakayı söküp çıkardıktan sonra arızalı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetik{/g} parçaların tellerini bulup kesiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully examine the servitor until you eventually spot the cover on its chest. After unscrewing and removing the plate, you discover the wires for the failed {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} parts and cut them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetörü dikkatlice inceleyip nihayet göğsündeki kapağı fark ediyorsun. Plakayı söküp çıkardıktan sonra arızalı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetik{/g} parçaların tellerini bulup kesiyorsun.{/n}
